item.title: Scott Pelley Blames Everyone But CBS For Network’s Tanked Credibility
item.description: CBS's 60 Minutes is the perpetrator, not the victim, of propaganda and partisanship.

item.title: Australia Doesn’t Have A Gun Problem, It Has An Islamist Problem
item.description: At least 15 people were murdered at a Hanukkah celebration at Bondi Beach in Australia on Sunday after two alleged Islamic terrorists opened fire. One...

item.title: Trump Must Appoint Republicans To USPS Board Currently Run By Mail-In Voting Activist
item.description: USPS is the largest 'precinct' in federal elections, yet has no citizens conducting oversight to prevent ballot tampering or loss.

item.title: The Indiana Redistricting Fail Is A Lot More Complicated Than Pro-Trump Vs. Anti-Trump
item.description: The Trump administration needed to show the people and our representatives out in flyover country that redistricting is about protecting us. It failed...

item.title: Trump’s Oil Tanker Seizure: Another Shocking And Unprecedented Act That Isn’t Shocking Or Unprecedented
item.description: The seizure of a stateless oil tanker carrying Maduro’s oil is aggressive, but it isn’t clearly reckless or an act of 'sleepwalking.'
